intro: Stemonurus ceylanicus, commonly known as the Ceylon starflower, is a flowering plant native to Sri Lanka. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants known for their distinctive leaf shapes and often vibrant flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and stream banks. Its flowers are small, star-shaped, and usually white or pale pink, arranged in clusters.
